title: The requirements for fitments for drainage and sanitation in the case of buildings other than residences shall be in accordance with Table No
clause_text: The requirements for fitments for drainage and sanitation in the case of buildings other than residences shall be in accordance with Table No.12-C to 12-P. The following shall be, in addition, taken into consideration :
